sentences.english: Objective:To make clear of the composition of gangue-combustion fly ash under 70μm and benefit its comprehensive utilization.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解矸石电厂粉煤灰的组成，指导其综合利用。

sentences.english: Because it can precisely dose the raw materials, we can ensure the quality.
sentences.chinese: 因计量准确，能有效地保证粉煤灰或灰砂砖的质量。

sentences.english: Some problems that should be heeded in the use of fly-ash have also been proposed.
sentences.chinese: 论文中还提出了使用粉煤灰掺合料应注意的几个问题。

sentences.english: High performance fly ash concrete is a kind of green building materials with vast development foreground.
sentences.chinese: 粉煤灰高性能混凝土是具有广阔发展前景的绿色建材。

sentences.english: The resulting coal ash and gypsum are sold to the cement industry.
sentences.chinese: 剩余的煤灰和石膏粉则出售给水泥行业。

sentences.english: And ink from soot and spit.
sentences.chinese: 墨水用煤灰和唾液来做。

sentences.english: In tunnels, a lashing backhand fills the cab with soot.
sentences.chinese: 过隧道时，反向风把煤灰灌进驾驶室。

sentences.english: Saponification slag-fly ash can be used in the high fill sections of highway.
sentences.chinese: 皂化渣粉煤灰可以用做桥头等高填土路段的回填材料。

sentences.english: Fly-ash mortar is seldom used in Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 粉煤灰砂浆粉在大连地区鲜有使用。

sentences.english: Ash from powdered coal is known to present itself with large amounts in hollow glassine granules of micron sizes.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还可从粉煤灰中提取相当数量的粉末状焦炭。

sentences.english: A description is given of the production of fine coal ash bricks from gasifer slag and boiler cinder.
sentences.chinese: 介绍利用造气炉渣和锅炉废渣生产粉煤灰砖的情况。

sentences.english: The arsenic-containing industrial wastewater treated with fly ash as adsorbent has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以粉煤灰为吸附剂处理含砷工业废水。

sentences.english: The size reduction process of fly ash with grinding aids has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助磨剂作用下粉煤灰的微细化过程。

sentences.english: Greenpeace investigated coal ash pollution from the Shentou number two power plant.
sentences.chinese: 绿色和平组织对神头二电厂的煤灰污染进行了调查。

sentences.english: Experimental Study on the Treatment of Wastewater Containing Arsenic by Polysilicate-metal Salts;
sentences.chinese: 研究了以粉煤灰为吸附剂处理含砷工业废水。

sentences.english: It also indicates that the adsorption behavior accords with the Freundlich Equation and the adsorption capacity declines with the temperature increased.
sentences.chinese: 随着吸附温度的升高，改性粉煤灰的吸附能力下降。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
